Every View Counts

NIPS 20 Every View Counts: Cross-View Consistency in 3DObject Detection with Hybrid-Cylindrical-SphericalVoxelization

Category Description
Type LiDAR 3D object deteciton + supervised
Contribution Cross-View Consistency loss from BEV and RV view (firstwork that introduces the concept of Cross-view Consistency to 3D detection task)
a new Voxel representation, Hybrid-Cylindrical-Spherical (HCS) Voxels
